title: OLTP Schema Definition & Relation Mapping
description: Analyze ERD and implement `schema.prisma`. Define models for User, Merchant, Customer, Order, and their relations. Configure indexes.
acceptance_criteria: Schema validates; Migrations created; Relations enforce integrity
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Local DB seeds successfully
deployment_notes: Run initial migration on staging DB

title: Migration Workflow & Client Generation
description: Set up local Postgres container. Create initial migration. Generate Prisma Client. Implement seed script.
acceptance_criteria: Docker compose up works; Seeding succeeds

title: ClickHouse Schema Design (MergeTree)
description: Design SQL DDL for SalesFact and AbandonedCartFact. Optimize partition keys and primary keys for OLAP.
acceptance_criteria: DDL scripts created; Performance verified on test data
deployment_notes: Apply DDL manually or via migration tool

title: ClickHouse Client Integration
description: Implement typed Node.js wrapper for ClickHouse client. Configure connection pooling/buffering for serverless.
acceptance_criteria: Client connects; Queries execute; Types are safe

title: OAuth State Management & Redirect
description: Implement /api/salla/auth/url. Generate secure state, store in cookie/Redis, return Salla auth URL.
acceptance_criteria: Correct URL generation; Secure state storage; CSRF protection

title: OAuth Callback & Token Exchange
description: Implement /api/salla/callback. Validate state. Exchange code for tokens. Handle errors.
acceptance_criteria: Tokens retrieved; Errors handled (400/500); User redirected

title: Token Encryption & Storage
description: Implement AES-256-GCM encryption for tokens. Store in Postgres. Decrypt utility.
acceptance_criteria: Tokens encrypted at rest; Decryption works; Keys secure

title: OAuth Integration Tests
description: Automated tests mocking Salla API for success, failure, and edge cases.
acceptance_criteria: High test coverage; Edge cases covered

title: CDC Architecture & QStash Setup
description: Design event payload. Configure QStash. Implement publisher in Service Layer for Order/Customer mutations.
acceptance_criteria: Publisher functional; QStash receiving events

title: CDC Consumer: Data Transformation
description: Implement QStash consumer endpoint. Transform raw Order/Customer payloads to ClickHouse schema.
acceptance_criteria: Payloads validated; Transformation correct

title: CDC Consumer: ClickHouse Insertion
description: Implement batch insertion to ClickHouse. Handle errors and DLQ.
acceptance_criteria: Data visible in CH; Idempotency verified

title: CDC Load Testing & Optimization
description: Simulate high volume of events. Measure latency. Optimize batch sizes.
acceptance_criteria: Latency < 5 mins; No data loss

title: Sales Aggregation Queries (SQL)
description: Write parameterized SQL queries for ClickHouse to aggregate sales data (hourly/daily). comparison logic.
acceptance_criteria: Queries return correct aggregations; Performance < 100ms

title: Sales API Route Implementation
description: Implement /api/analytics/sales. Validate params. Call aggregation service. Cache headers.
acceptance_criteria: JSON response correct; Input validation; Caching active

title: Sales API Unit & Load Tests
description: Unit tests for logic. Load tests for concurrency.
acceptance_criteria: Tests pass; p95 < 200ms

title: Base Chart Wrapper Implementation
description: Create generic Recharts wrappers (Line/Bar) with responsive behavior and loading states.
acceptance_criteria: Charts resize correctly; Skeletons shown loading; No-data state handled

title: Chart Theming & Tooltips
description: Custom Tooltips. Light/Dark mode support via Tailwind.
acceptance_criteria: Dark mode works; Tooltips styled

title: Chart Component Storybook/Documentation
description: Create stories/examples for charts.
acceptance_criteria: Docs exist and accurate

title: RAG Context Retrieval Logic
description: Implement search pgvector for schema/context and query ClickHouse for data summaries.
acceptance_criteria: Relevant context retrieved; Token limits respected

title: Prompt Engineering & OpenAI Integration
description: Design system prompts. Implement OpenAI API call with retry and PII scrubbing.
acceptance_criteria: Valid SQL generation; PII protected

title: RAG API Endpoint & Security
description: Implement /api/ai/query. Enforce RBAC and Tenant Isolation on generated SQL.
acceptance_criteria: Tenant isolation verified; Rate limiting active

title: AI Assistant UI Component
description: Chat interface with streaming support. Markdown/Chart rendering.
acceptance_criteria: Streaming works; Charts render correctly

title: AI Evaluation Framework
description: Automated test suite for RAG accuracy.
acceptance_criteria: Eval script functional

title: Cart Recovery: Email Template Editor
description: Implement TipTap editor for email templates. Support dynamic variable insertion (e.g., {{customer_name}}).
acceptance_criteria: Rich text editing works; Variable insertion functional; Saving template works

title: Cart Recovery: Scheduler Service
description: Implement job scheduler using QStash to trigger email sending. Logic to check abandonment threshold.
acceptance_criteria: Emails triggered on time; Suppression list respected

title: Cart Recovery: Webhook Handler
description: Handle cart.abandoned webhook from Salla. Queue job for recovery.
acceptance_criteria: Webhook validated; Job queued

title: Postmark Email Integration
description: Implement email sending service wrapper using Postmark API. Handle templates and delivery.
acceptance_criteria: Emails sent successfully; Errors handled
